com.automation.seletest.core.selenium.mobileAPI

Class AppiumDriverController<T extends io.appium.java_client.AppiumDriver>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.automation.seletest.core.selenium.webAPI.DriverBaseController<T>
      • com.automation.seletest.core.selenium.mobileAPI.AppiumDriverController<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppiumController

    @Component
public class AppiumDriverController<T extends io.appium.java_client.AppiumDriver>
extends DriverBaseController<T>
implements AppiumController
    (AppiumDriverController api for iOS-Android native app interaction
    Author:
    Giannis Papadakis (mailTo:gpapadakis84@gmail.com)
